CartItemPriceAdjustment.name: CartItemPriceAdjustment
CartItemPriceAdjustment.description: Price adjustment for a cart item.

AdjustmentAmountScope.description: Scope of the adjustment amount for a promotion.

AdjustmentBasisReferenceId.description: Coupon code of the coupon associated with a promotion. This field is available in API version 54.0 and later.

AdjustmentTargetType.description: Target for the price adjustment (the cart itself or individual items).

AdjustmentType.description: Indicates if the price adjustment is applied as percentage or an absolute amount.

AdjustmentValue.description: Numeric value of the adjustment (for example, 10 if the price adjustment is either 10% off or $10 off).

CartId.description: The ID of the WebCart that’s associated with a cart item. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

CartItemId.description: ID of the parent cart item to which this adjustment belongs.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. Default value is USD.

PriceAdjustmentCauseId.description: ID of entity that caused this adjustment (for example, a promotion ID). If unspecified, then Description populates the display name.

Priority.description: If there are multiple price adjustments, sequence in which the price adjustments are applied.

TotalAmount.description: Total price after applying price adjustments.

TotalGrossAmount.description: The total gross amount (tax inclusive) after applying price adjustments. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

TotalNetAmount.description: The total net amount (tax exclusive) after applying price adjustments. This field is available in API version 55.0 and later.

TotalTax.description: Tax on the total adjusted price.

WebCartAdjustmentGroupId.description: ID of the cart’s adjustment group.
